website_summaries.verdict: This blower has a high velocity capacity, but is designed for low noise production and quiet operation.
pros: Sweeper clears leaves and debris from hard surfaces such as concrete and pavement
cons: Works best clearing debris from hard surfaces

customer_reviews.title: lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I love this leaf blower for being small & lightweight it is very powerful and you will not go wrong with buying this item .l have LUPUS and have pain in my hands and this product is great for anyone who has trouble with their hands.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Eaken

customer_reviews.title: Got it because I already had a weed whacker with ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it because I already had a weed whacker with the 40V & 2 batteries, so I figured to stay with the 40V B&D. Smaller than I thought, but very light physically, but also in the ability to blow. I got it for a deck, garage interior & walkway, all flat surfaces, so it was ok. It won't replace a gas blower.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: This won't blow off a leaf
customer_reviews.text: I have had blowers in past, actually bought my first lithium battery one at Sams, and then thought this would work for my small patio in an apartment. When I tell you the wind created by this machine is not 1/4 of what one needs to blow off cigarette ash, I am telling you the truth. I have now bought the corded one from amazon as I own one of these but I thought this would work as SAMS one and it does not. M
customer_reviews.author: Advanced Medical - CPRx

customer_reviews.title: Not enough power.
customer_reviews.text: I assumed that 40V meant adequate power. It does not. The Black & Decker 40V Hedge Trimmer is terrific. It must require lots of power to create a useful amount of wind. I think $99.00 is too much.
customer_reviews.author: u2mcf101

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Right price. Right weight. Right power. Waiting to see if there is a battery issue.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Useless. Do NOT buy. Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Drying power? Really? Not much of a leaf or debris blower. This thing hardly blows enough to move dust around. Pros: light weight and well balanced. Battery Life? Not sure. I couldn't use it long enough to drain. Once I saw how horrible it was, I boxed it up and set it aside. I'm hoping I have a power tool or two that uses the same battery. That way I don't feel like I wasted my money. (Update: I don't) Cons: This product wouldn't blow away a frog fart let alone clean any household or yard debris. Useless. Do NOT buy. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon L.

customer_reviews.title: Good Sidewalk and Driveway Sweeper
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, this is not a blower, it is a "sweeper" and does lack the power of a true blower. That being said, it does work well clearing my approximately 80 foot sidewalk and 30 foot driveway. It does have power enough to clear newly cut grass that is not too wet from a recent rain. I do like how light it is and it is VERY easy to use. You click on the battery and push the button to make it go and push the same button to turn it off. I would recommend this and probably buy another one if needed, depending on how long this one lasts.
customer_reviews.author: MKfromPA

customer_reviews.title: Light weight for a senior lady to handle
customer_reviews.text: This Black and Decker fit my needs just fine. I use it for blowing off the back Trex decking covered with oak leaves, also down the steps and on the front lawn. We have lots of road base rock pathways and if I angle it just right, it will blow off the leaves leaving the rocks where they belong. It's also great for the garage floor, concrete sidewalks and street gutters. Best thing is it's not to heavy and I don't mind rolling up the extension cord when I'm done.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Lady

customer_reviews.title: Love this blower
customer_reviews.text: Very Lightweight, Runs a long time on a full battery. Strong enough for most things like blowing out the garage, blowing grass clippings etc' Perfect for someone who does not want to mess with gas units or an electric cord. Well worth the money. I would buy another one fin a flash if needed. If you ar buying and expect it to be exactly like your old gas unit, it not going to be, but for the size and ease of use it is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: The Happy Cook

customer_reviews.title: It's a broom with, not a blower
customer_reviews.text: It's light weight and convenient. Perfect for grab and go to clean up the deck, garage and sidewalks. Keep in mind it's called a sweeper, not a blower and for very good reason. Can't imagine that battery life would ever be an issue as I doubt I would ever tackle a big enough job with this "sweeper" to exhaust the battery. While it might blow a few leaves off the driveway, it certainly isn't made to handle fall drops from the yard. It would be like trying to vacuum the house with a little dust buster.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight but Not Especially Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as I was looking for a cordless leaf blower and wanted to avoid the heavier gas powered units. As a bonus, it has a 40W battery that is interchangeable with other Black and Decker equipment I have. It definitely is lightweight and easy to use. However, the power is such that it is really only appropriate for very light jobs like blowing grass clippings or small amounts of dust. This will NOT be appropriate for a spring or fall cleanup in areas with large amounts of leaves, especially if they are wet.
customer_reviews.author: R. Barmore

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for myself to clear out the leaves outside and also to clear out my garage. I found the unit to be very late. However, the battery life was very short like 30 to 40 minutes. Then it was a hassle to take the battery out and to plug it into charge it. Meanwhile my project could not be completed. I ended up returning this unit. I bought another Black & Decker cup with a cord and I am much happier with it. It is not quite as light as the other but it is not really that heavy. It does the job for me without the bothersome of stopping in the middle to charge the battery.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this item. I have the 40v trimmer and the chainsaw and they are fantastic. This blower is terrible and there is no way that it blows at 125mph that they claim. Seriously this blower has as much output as a hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Water G Bollinger

customer_reviews.title: Nice, small, light, quiet, functional blower
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, small, quiet, lightweight, functional blower. I’ve included video so you can see it does a fine job moving dry leaves, twigs, dust and dirt. I have a corded Toro high power, loud, heavy, hurricane generator. 90% of the time I grab the little B&D blower, because when I blow out the garage, I don’t need to be able to blow my tools off the bench.
customer_reviews.author: Chellejeff

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Nice
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this because I needed an extra battery for my line trimmer and this is only slightly more expensive than the battery itself. It's surprisingly useful though. I blow out the garage, clean up sidewalks, blow dust off my lawn furniture before guests arrive, and my kids use it to blow tree debris off their trampoline before jumping. I use it a couple times a week and I'm really happy with it. It's not the most powerful blower around, but it's pretty quiet and it gets the job done. For leaves, I usually just use a rake since it's fast and efficient. That said, this thing IS powerful enough to do light leaf/grass blowing work.
customer_reviews.author: Dean D.

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn't stay locked in box on the equipment so power goes off.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 10 months ago and took it out yesterday for some springtime cleanup. After two tries, I couldn't get the battery to stay in the box on the equipment so it would not run. I tried numerous times to get it to stay, but it doesn't connect. Looks like the plastic piece that locks it in is broken. This is the second Black and Decker weed wacker I have purchased on Amazon in the past two years. Needless to say, I will not repeat that mistake. The equipment is useless since the battery doesn't connect tightly to the equipment housing.
customer_reviews.author: M. Desannoy

customer_reviews.title: The child blowing bubbles next door offers the same blowing power
customer_reviews.text: I too bought this blower because I already own the 40V B&D weed trimmer. The trimmer is great! But, this blower is NOT great. Even though it's small and light, it's incredibly gutless.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent T Nickols

customer_reviews.title: Little Leaf Blaster
customer_reviews.text: After getting input from a friend on his black and decker40v sweeper, he's had for several year i bought one. Where it gets my 5 stars is it light, easy to charge with included charger and no cord to pull around. Its not as powerful as my big corded leaf blower, but its convenient and quick to clear a patio or front sidewalk and steps and vey quiet. No need for ear protectors. It compliments my other high powered blowers. The fully charged battery lasts me around 30-40 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Com

customer_reviews.title: but I am very disappointed. One leaf laying on floor of my garage ...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I am expecting too much out of this product, but I am very disappointed. One leaf laying on floor of my garage and it would barely move with this thing right next to it. I bought a 40v B&D String trimmer several years ago. That thing is amazing. Since this is 40V, I thought it would be just as good. This thing does not work like I thought. I used a whole roll of tape and put my old 20 year electric one back together. I am going to return this one and use my old faithful electric one. Sorry I bought this one. Disappointed in B&D and this product
customer_reviews.author: S51566

customer_reviews.title: Great Deck Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife because she normally blows off the long deck upstairs that runs the length of our house. We live in the woods so leaves are a constant mess on the deck as well spider webs. My engine powered blower was too heavy for her so I bought her this and she loves it. It works great and she can even blow out debris from behind the wood boxes. I recommend it but for the big heavy duty jobs, I stand by my power blower.
customer_reviews.author: Linam g

customer_reviews.title: Nice driveway/garage/porch  sweeper !!
customer_reviews.text: This little sweeper blows! Think of this 40v battery powered blower as a sweeper, not unlike a broom. It does a great job at sweeping out my garage, sweeping away debris from edging my driveway, rear porch, cleaning off my mower, etc. It is lightweight, charges quickly and easily lasts the required time for me to complete my work around the yard. The battery even has "state of charge lights" built in. Nice little unit like all of the Black & Decker battery powered yard tools. If you are considering the 20V model, some users say purchase this model. Glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: D4D

customer_reviews.title: Well I really wanted this sweeper to do the trick!
customer_reviews.text: Well I really wanted this sweeper to do the trick! Unfortunately it fell a bit short. The best part about this blower was its size and weight! Very comfortable to use. The Battery life was pretty good! Not the best but good! BUT the blower itself is not very powerful! I was hoping for much better but it just did not work well for my yard. I returned it!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Good Power
customer_reviews.text: Purchased because of matching battery to my weed whip. As some of the reviews say, the air power is not extremely strong. But the description says for hard surfaces. What were they expecting. The description is what it is. This unit is wonderful for garage, sidewalk, driveway, and decks. It is perfect for blowing leaves out of garden mulch. The mulch doesn't end up all over. It is also great for 'dusting' in the garage. Items on shelves stay on the shelves, unlike when I used my corded blower.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have used the 40v B&D mower and weed eater for a few years. I was excited to see a 40v blower as I wasn't interested in anything less. This 40v blower is perfect for our yard and crepe myrtle blooms. It a quick set to pop in a battery and blow leaves off our deck. And...I no longer need a gas can and oil for a gas-powered blower. If you have a yard with several trees and large leaves, this may not be the blower for you, but I am not sure. It is definitely what we need. Simple, VERY lightweight, and quick.
customer_reviews.author: J. Black

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and powerful enough
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. I have a much more powerful corded blower but it was a hassle messing with the cord. Also it was so strong it sucked my skirt and some plants up and shredded them. You had to be very careful when using it. This is not so powerful plenty powerful enough for clearing leaves and debri off my patios. I like it that it's really lightweight too. I use it more often because it is easier to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Retwahine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, light weight, works for us
customer_reviews.text: My husband was getting irritated about our plug in blower, not a big deal but we moved to Texas when he retired and it gets hot fast here vs Wisconsin. Anyhow, I surprised him with this and he was quite pleased, I have to say I am too. It is so light weight. It works well for blowing grass clippings and a bit of dirt off the side walk and driveway after mowing. The plug in one blows stuff further but this works perfect for our needs. I can't believe how light weight it is, my back doesn't hurt at all when I'm done with the front and back.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and quick cleanup
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this medium size blower. He has a large, more powerful electric blower for the whole driveway, but grabs this one more often for quick work of the deck, patio, front walk. Being battery operated, it has a little less oomph, but works so well when you don't need to get out the heavy model and 100' of extension cords.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: As a truck driver this is perfect. I use it to clean out my trailer and it works great. Not a huge amount of blowing power, but it’s compact and moves dust and debris. If you’re trying to blow leaves across the yard then it’s not the blower for you but for cleaning a garage or blowing off a driveway it works great. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Alex Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not enough power.
customer_reviews.text: The charging unit failed on my old b & d blower. I replaced the whole unit for little more than a new chg. unit would cost. The new one, even though an upgrade, has much less blower capacity than the old one.
customer_reviews.author: douglas muth

customer_reviews.title: Even with tempered expectations, it is still pretty weak.
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I understood this was not going to be the strongest blower in the world. I only intend to use it for sweeping flat surfaces so I was OK with that. I couldn't argue with the comparative price. Nevertheless, this blower is what the reviews say it is -- a pretty weak blower that is just good enough to make me keep it.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is intended to do very well.
customer_reviews.text: This sweeper is one of those things that just make life easier!! Not a heavy duty type sweeper but fantastic for blowing out the garage, sidewalk etc. of everyday dirt that blows in. Soooooo much easier than having to sweep everything with a broom. Easy to charge and holds the charge for a very long time in use. I'm a senior and can say that I truly love using this sweeper. Gets the job done easily and without fuss.
customer_reviews.author: S. Berg

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The blower is quick and easy to use and the price is right but the power is a little light. It's okay for blowing freshly cut grass or leaves off of sidewalks and porch but not practical for the end of the year full yard leaf blowing. You will need electric or gas for that. It is handy though to grab and blow off the sidewalks after cutting the grass.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: So I opened up the box and there was no leaf blower and somehow a piece from a trampoline was placed in the box and not the item I ordered. How someone can confuse a leaf blower and a piece of a trampoline is beyond me!
customer_reviews.author: William Brian

customer_reviews.title: Just not enough power
customer_reviews.text: This sweeper just does not have the power to use for any type of major leaf blowing. It's fine for removing leaves from a smooth surface such as a patio, deck, or driveway, but in the grass or with a large amount of leaves, it does not have the power to move a lot of debris. I will keep it to use to sweep the back deck, but nothing like a gas powered or electric corded blower for big jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done -- as long as "the job" is mostly dry and on hard surfaces
customer_reviews.text: For blowing mostly dry grass and leaves off of a sidewalk or other hard surface, this thing is great. I used to lug out the shop vac/blower to clean out the garage -- now I can use this sweeper, which is much easier. Based on reviews I didn't expect this to compete with plug-in or gas "leaf blowers". It doesn't, but it's perfectly adequate for the purposes mentioned above.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My old Ryobi finally died and this was a great replacement. It's much lighter and easier to manage. I just use it to blow the leaves off the sidewalk, so I only use it for less than 10 min, but the battery doesn't seem to last much longer than 10 min. My old one was 18V and this is 40V, so I was surprised, but I like that it isn't so heavy or noisy. Great value for the price. I was not about to spend $59-120 to replace my old battery!
customer_reviews.author: Marla Z

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight yet powerful blower
customer_reviews.text: Everything from cleaning my Z-turn to blowing wet leaves off of my MTB trails, this thing handles what I've thrown at it. The battery lasts for a long while, I haven't fully drained it yet even after working with it intermittently over a few hours. Not sure how long it will last, but it hasn't let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Ken H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for VERY small jobs
customer_reviews.text: This is best used for very lite work such as blowing some leaves off your driveway or maybe the sawdust off the garage floor. Its lite and well built but VERY low on power which is no surprise given the voltage. Don't expect too much from this little tool and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nick R.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected but still very useful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this model because it uses the same battery as the string trimmer I bought in the fall. Love the string trimmer. So done with Gas stuff and always having problems. The blower is a bit smaller than expected but works great on my driveway / sidewalk. I think blowing leaves in grass would be a bit tough. Battery life is great.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R.

customer_reviews.title: Not a Leaf Blower!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for light jobs, but be aware that it doesn’t work well on a pile of leaves. There just isn’t enough power. You might get 20 minutes of battery use before it’s time for another charge. My advice would be to spend a few more dollars and get a little better power.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Martin

customer_reviews.title: LIghtweight and powerful enough for my tasks
customer_reviews.text: I mainly bought this to blow out my driveway after mowing. It does that with no qualms, I have been finding that I am using it more than I anticipated. It is great for blowing out the garage and the patio. Plenty of battery life, I have yet to use it until it is out of power. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Shinorma

customer_reviews.title: A great improvement over my last B&D 40V blower
customer_reviews.text: I have used a B & D 40V blower in the past because the work well, but after about a years started making noise like it was about to die. Their replacement blower has been redesigned to work better & be more compact. I highly recommend this blower to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Parker, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Small powerful
customer_reviews.text: I use it for just the small jobs. it is great. Clean my deck and keep it under my desk because it is small. Use it tp blow the water off my car after cleaning and beforeI dry it. Small and agile with a plastic wand so if I touch my car it wont scratch it. So glad I bought it. Want to get another for my aircraft hangar
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely just a sweeper.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy to use but it is just a sweeper, not a powerful leaf blower. At best this will blow a few magnolia leaves at a time. I do volunteer work at a local cemetery and I mainly use this for blowing cut grass and dirt off of gravestones.
customer_reviews.author: DSoprano

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Being an elderly lady, I was unsure about buying a sweeper/blower. But I figured if it was too heavy I could send it back. Now, midweek from gardeners visits, I am out blowing off all the way around the house. It works great, and not too heavy at all. As I tend to wander around outside barefooted, it keeps all manners of things off my patio and walkways. I recharge it every 2 or 3 weeks, but haven't run out of battery power yet.
customer_reviews.author: Christine B.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have the power of the LSW36 even though it has the same specs
customer_reviews.text: Intermittent start button. Not strong enough to get the job done. The lower profile was a nice space saver for the RV. Wish it would have done a better job and not had starting problems. The B/D LSW36 is a better option with variable speed.....
customer_reviews.author: Debra J Giltz

customer_reviews.title: Quite satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It is a "sweeper" as stated. That said, it is good at that. I use it to blow grass clippings, fertilizer pellets, etc. off our sidewalk and vehicle concrete pad. I have other B&D 40 V equipment and this sweeper is a welcome addition. I have had it for no more than 1-1/2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Leightim

customer_reviews.title: Lack of POWER
customer_reviews.text: This product was a complete waste of money, it does not have much power at all and ended up having to rake the leaves. Works to blow grass clippings off sidewalks and patio as long as the grass is very dry but beyond that it was a worthless purchase.
customer_reviews.author: feisty grandma

customer_reviews.title: Not very powerful.. good for very small areas
customer_reviews.text: This leaf blower is light weight and easy out of the box to use. However compared with my gas engine leaf blower, it takes ten to times longer to blow off a driveway, garage, or in my case, pickleball court. This is fine for small areas but not large.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Good, a keeper.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, light weight with power to blow my dry leaves out of my yard, and move them where I want them. Not too much power where the leaves get blown all over. But...the battery lasts about 20 minutes tops. Yeah, I would buy again anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keeping area around outside doors clear of leaves
customer_reviews.text: Live under a LOT of oak trees...we were constantly tracking them in. Have a plug-in blower, but a pain in the A to keep setting it up....NOW? with THIS blower, can clear three doorsteps in less than five minutes...Wish I had purchased it years ago
customer_reviews.author: R B

customer_reviews.title: Battery drains quickly
customer_reviews.text: It’s light weight, powerful enough to sweep deck and driveway but the battery drains very quickly. I’m very glad that I bought cordless blower.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: With a relatively large patio this lite weight sweeper is worth its weight in gold. I purchased the larger battery due to the patios size and I'm able to sweep the entire patio, blow the pine needles off the furniture cushions then sweep the two other porches and still have battery life left. The battery charges quickly and it always ready for the next use. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Battery does work with drill
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I have black and decker cordless drill and wanted to be able to swap out batteries but they are not interchangeable. Other than that the blower works alright as you would expect and electric blower to work. Would probably give 5 stars if batteries were interchangeable.
customer_reviews.author: KR77777

customer_reviews.title: 40V will not blow grass off your driveway
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of battery vs. gasoline. I also love the weight of this thing. It is extremely light; however, I do not recommend this product if you want to blow the grass off of your driveway, patio, or anything for that matter. It is simply not powerful enough. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful simpble quiet tool
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful simpble quiet tool. Now I don't need to inhale exhaust smoke when I need to clean driveway after mowing. And I do not at all mind the few extra sweeps, it is powerful enough for my long driveway at the end of one acre. Kudos to development team.
customer_reviews.author: EV4Life

customer_reviews.title: Light and efficient
customer_reviews.text: It is not strong enough to blow a full yard of leaves, but it does a great job on our deck, patio, walkway and front porch. No more cords and it so easy that we keep those places much neater than previously, be cause it is so convenient.
customer_reviews.author: RecrodII

customer_reviews.title: Basically a hair blow drier
customer_reviews.text: I have the 40volt B&D hedge trimmer, love it. Bought this, which uses the same battery. This blower is only good for dry leaves on a flat hard surface. Our bathroom blow drier is more powerful, seriously. Pass on this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: great little blower
customer_reviews.text: perfect for clearing debris off a patio, deck or porch. i have a very large crepe myrtle that has lots of droppings. this blower helps me keeping my porch clear. great little blower
customer_reviews.author: Ed F

customer_reviews.title: Too many whiners here
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I excepted. I have a brain injury and easily trip over cords. It removes leaves, dust and dirt. If your trying to blow sand a half mile.....you need to study better.
customer_reviews.author: Shopdude

customer_reviews.title: Great Maneuverability
customer_reviews.text: Love how light weight this is; even with the battery. Your arms do not get tired swinging it around and moving it around to blow the grass clippings or leaves. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Joel C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed it the power
customer_reviews.text: I think a hair dryer with a long tube would be just as efficient at blowing off a small porch. The only plus is that it is lightweight and the battery is exchangeable with the trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Rollin

customer_reviews.title: The machine works great.
customer_reviews.text: This blower is just what I needed after my older model died after providing years of service. Black and Decker wins again. This new blower is perfect. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blower to use for little jobs like my patio and garage. I have been happily surprised that it has enough power to do my driveway - when it is not super heavy grass and debris. It is super lightweight and perfect for older people like me. I highly recommend this product. GREAT BATTERY LIFE also.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda S Haskins

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't have the power of a leaf blower but it sure beats sweeping the garage, deck and front porch. Lightweight, easy to use. Recharges quickly. Great blower if you don't overtask it.
customer_reviews.author: David Jay

customer_reviews.title: Black & Decker Cordless Swipper
customer_reviews.text: Take the time to read the instructions. It was very easy to charge the battery. It is very light and does an excellent job in clearing my deck and driveway. The battery can remain plugged so it is always charged. I recommend the cordless swipper.
customer_reviews.author: John  II

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the power level.
customer_reviews.text: I had a black and decker 40 volt blower bug the motor began making a loud noise. It still worked but the noise was so loud i was worried it was bothering the neighbors. I thought this unit would be the same power and having an extra battery to use with my 50 volt black and decker weed eater was going to be a plus but I found the bower was much lighter duty. I’d send it back but I already destroyed the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jon H.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Easy for an older female to handle. Good for light cleanup jobs like blowing off your deck, walkway or stairs but would probably not be powerful enough for landscape work.
customer_reviews.author: General

customer_reviews.title: Not a good blow🤗
customer_reviews.text: Great product for small jobs. I can’t see it blowing leaves though. It is t very powerful Lightweight and easy to operate. Recommend for small jobs.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: My Wife Really Likes It
customer_reviews.text: My wife is the gardener/mower (she fell in love with our John Deere tractor surprising both of us). Now she can blow the grass off the walks, patio and driveway, effortlessly. She's very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Loursat

customer_reviews.title: very weak
customer_reviews.text: im glad I only had leaves and very light dust in my garage it barely blew that out never buy b and d again was lookin to buy weed eater but I need more power than weak tools
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: Love it but......
customer_reviews.text: ...a bit low on power. Real good 40V system that uses the same battery from item to item. I love that. I don't try to use this on the lays. As stated, it's a smooth surface blower. For that it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: S197mustangfan

customer_reviews.title: Great for light clean ups
customer_reviews.text: This is good for a quick clean up. Easy to use but is lacking the power of my gas powered blower. This is great for cleaning light dry leafs or debris, I would not recommend this for heavy wet leafs.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and fairly powerful for its size
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I use it all the time to clean my garage and sweep my drive, walk, and patio. It's lightweight and seems to hold a charge for as long as it takes me to perform a task. It's not a leaf blower to use in a big yard or to use for large tasks, but it's much easier to use than a rake or broom for lighter tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Adequite
customer_reviews.text: Using it to blow debris from under the plants, not what it was designed for but it does a fair job.
customer_reviews.author: Randall S. Foster

customer_reviews.title: A little short on power
customer_reviews.text: I have the B & D 40 volt chain saw that uses the same battery pack, and it's fantastic. So I expected the same from this blower, but it just doesn't put out the air to really be top notch. It handles light duty work, but needs more guts for the heavy stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great for anyone
customer_reviews.text: Not heavy, easy to use, good battery life. Women or men will enjoy using it. Powerful and light. Have been using it every weekend since I got it and still feels and sounds like the first day I got it.
customer_reviews.author: james96721

customer_reviews.title: Good  smaller  sweeper
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something for my patio and this works great. not ment for large jobs but dose the job on my patio.
customer_reviews.author: Lucille Allen

customer_reviews.title: Battery operated, Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to use. Light weight and no cord. No loud engine noise. The nozzle comes off so it is easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Edd Huetteman

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Just disappointed that it isn't more powerful but then I didn't want anything heavy and cumbersome. So for blowing out the driveway and gutters on the house it is perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: #1teacher

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: you're better off blowing with your lips than using this underperformer
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it will do.
customer_reviews.text: It is compact and quiet. I needed it to blow off my patio and it certainly did that well. It is small enough to fit around lawn chairs and table legs. It is good for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Goff

customer_reviews.title: Super Product!!
customer_reviews.text: This product works great!!! I am glad I bought one. It is lightweight making it very easy to use. The battery life is long. Losing the electric cord is a super achievement for me.
customer_reviews.author: William J Stanczak

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is light weight but the battery charge will not last a long time. Can do my yard clean up but not enough charge to finish my mothers yard. Just learned to bring the charger .
customer_reviews.author: LYNN

customer_reviews.title: Very little power
customer_reviews.text: This product has very little power. Hardly blew off leaves on my deck. I returned it. I never return items from amazon, but this one wasn’t worth the money. Also, my refund should be added to my credit card Not added to a gift card. Why was money added to gift card. I didn’t ask for that. Return my money to my credit card how I purchased this item ! It is impossible to find out how ask amazon to do that.
customer_reviews.author: JKuts

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: I finally have a blower that I can carry with ease! I have used it several times but not for drying. Now I have to do that cause I’m curious! You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ms

customer_reviews.title: It's a sweeper, not a blower
customer_reviews.text: Has power to move debris across a smooth surface, not pull leaves out of grass.
customer_reviews.author: Silverhair

customer_reviews.title: The best yard tool ever!
customer_reviews.text: This sweeper is light weight, quick to recharge, and easy for an old woman to manage. It has made quick work for cleaning my porch and sidewalk as well as the driveway. I'm pretty sure to would not be able to handle several inches of leaves...but if you go out each morning and don't let them accumulate, it just might do the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not great
customer_reviews.text: This blower works great on sidewalks and driveways but lacks the power needed while using it on the lawn. Battery seems to doi pretty quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Dice

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tool
customer_reviews.text: Light and appears to work well. Not really high end strong, but it works well for what we need. Husband didn’t want want and now that I purchased, uses it for everything including cleaning out the garage...
customer_reviews.author: kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use, But Not Very Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightweight, quiet, convenient way to blow away VERY LIGHT debris. It’s not very powerful, though. I would rate it 2-3 starts on power.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: For my Townhouse this is perfect. Just enough power for leaves and twigs
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: This makes cleaning off a large area very easy...no more broom!
customer_reviews.text: It is lightweight, easy to remove and attach battery for charging, easy to handle while it runs. Overall I am very happy with this item, and the power it has.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Ok...
customer_reviews.text: Just not quite as powerful as we hoped for. Good for blowing dry leaves or dust off of our patio, but, not strong enough to push anything heavier around. Still, very handy not to have to plug it in.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: This works as advertised. Great for light duty sweeping/blowing on smooth surfaces. Have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it. Goes for much longer on a charge than the directions claim it should. Great !
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE my leaf blower and the 40V battery lasts ! I use on my long driveway and 3 decks.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah G

customer_reviews.title: Super light duty .
customer_reviews.text: Its lighter for sure but the power is so weak. This is the 40v cant imagine the 20v.
customer_reviews.author: ALLYSON

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for light work
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot of power and battery life is good for light and quick jobs. It is light and easy to store. Works fine to clear out grass clips and leaves off my driveway.
customer_reviews.author: VV

customer_reviews.title: Nice & seems to do the job
customer_reviews.text: Power is pretty good & does the job of leaf blowing on concert & fake grass .
customer_reviews.author: Melora Harte

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER (LSW40C) 40V Max Cordless Sweeper
product_meta.description: Style:40V SweeperLightweight yet powerful, this cordless sweeper makes it easy to clear lawn debris from driveways, decks and other hard surfaces around your home. With speed up to 125 MPH, it gets the job done quickly but quietly. With a built-in state of charge indicator, you know at a glance how much power you have left.
feature_bullets: Up to 125 miles per hour air power to quickly and easily clear debris from hard surfaces
Low noise design for quiet operation
State of charge indicator which shows your Battery charge at a glance
Lightweight 4 lb design makes compact and easy to handle
Air Speed: 125 mph; Included Components: (1) LSW40 Cordless Sweeper, (1) LBX1540, (1) 40V MAX* Charger, (1) Blow Tube; Power Source: Battery

Maximum initial battery voltage (measured without a workload) is 40V; Nominal voltage is 36V; 3 Year limited Warranty; Uses Ideal for clearing driveways, sidewalks, decks, garages and other hard surfaces of leaves, grass clippings, and other lawn debris

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars825 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
